meanings.definition: A radio or television broadcast of news.
meanings.sent1: I watched the newscast on TV last night.
meanings.sent2: The newscast provided updates on the weather and traffic.
meanings.sent3: The newscast made me laugh with its funny weather report.
meanings.sent4: The newscast was a beacon of information in a sea of uncertainty.
meanings.sent5: The newscast painted a vivid picture of the day's events.

meanings.sent1: The radio station will newscast the latest headlines at noon.
meanings.sent2: They newscast important announcements to the public.
meanings.sent3: I newscasted the neighborhood gossip to my friends.
meanings.sent4: Her voice newscasted across the room, capturing everyone's attention.
meanings.sent5: The loudspeaker newscasts the emergency instructions clearly.
